messages.messageBody:
Here's another great link. I got it the other night, saw it was 40 minutes
long and thought, "I'll watch a couple minutes and finish it later." It was
too good to leave.



http://youtube.com/watch?v=pfRUMmTs0ZA



Marni



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Public-schooled kids in America "dumber than dirt"
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/gate/a/2007/10/24/notes102407.D TL Interesting article by Mark Morford about the perils of schooling in America
messages.messageBody:
http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/gate/a/2007/10/24/notes102407.D
TL

Interesting article by Mark Morford about the perils of schooling in America
today. Nothing we don't already know, but strengthens my resolve to always
unschool my 2.5 y/o son.

I like his line about mandated testing due to NCLB, etc.: It's like
weighing a calf twice a day, but never feeding it.

-=b.
